summary: This mod adds a bed that you can sleep in, an alchemy table that you can do science and your OWN chest to put your items in Riverwood! The extension at Riverwood was pointless, until now. Seriously though, why is nobody in Riverwood wasn't using that place already?
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]The extension at Riverwood was pointless, until now. Seriously though, why is nobody in Riverwood wasn't using that place already?

This mod adds a bed that you can sleep in, an alchemy table that you can do science and your OWN CHEST where you can put your items and stuff.

Version 1.1 adds interesting waterfalls and reshaped landscape around the area(effects the water).

[img]https://farm9.staticflickr.com/8662/16762378025_aaeba29f0e_c.jpg[/img]

[img]https://farm9.staticflickr.com/8585/16576238849_28b86a4f73_c.jpg[/img][/size][/color][/font][/center]
author: ProtologolusX
